storyInfo: By chance, Sora spots a former fan during an operation to fend off Reunion's assault on Lungmen. She tries to get in touch with the girl, but her only clues are a few handwritten letters.

attributes.content: What's going on?! Who are these people...?
attributes.name: Panicked Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: It's... it's Reunion! Why are they attacking us?!
attributes.name: Panicked Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: H-Huh...? What is going on—
attributes.name: Trapped Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: What... What are you people doing?
attributes.name: Panicked Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: Stop it! This is our neighborhood!
attributes.name: Panicked Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: Gah, scram if you don't want trouble!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Ughh—!
attributes.name: Trapped Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: You... You can't do this...
attributes.name: Trapped Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: Why not? You know what kind of a rotten life you've got in this pathetic place.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Stop it—
Who's there?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: I know that voice... It's her...!
attributes.name: Trapped Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: I made it... *pant*...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Please don't hurt them. They are innocent!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You've already razed a few blocks' worth of streets and shops. There are the homes of innocent civilians... How are they supposed to get by now?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Who cares?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Like I give a crap how they live. Now scram, or you're next!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: I'm not going to back down. I've spent my life bringing happiness... to encourage people to stay positive and live on.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That's why... if you're going to destroy their lives... I will protect them. I am more than capable.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Besides, I've got help.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Stop bluffi—
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: (Whistles)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Who's there...?!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Sorry we kept ya waitin', Sora.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Croissant, Exusiai, and... Texas.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I don't think they're all that discouraged by anything you just said.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: In that case, it's time that we, Penguin Logistics, allies of justice, show you what for! Boink! Kapow! We'll knock you all down, just like that!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: 'Penguin Logistics?' Heh, you really think you can stop us?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: It's an emergency, so we've got no time to check with the boss, but he's not one to just stand aside while a bunch of bad guys muck up our turf! This is where we do business, after all!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Watch out. We don't know what these men might do. I'll stall them here and put a stop to it.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Okay, Exusiai and I will take them out. Croissant, help evacuate the residents.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: On it, yeehaw!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: First, let's secure the path east...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Heyah—
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: W-Why can't... I... move?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Hmph, take this—
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: *cough*... It's the singing girl's Arts... Stop her song. Take her out first!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: *Pant*... *pant*...
attributes.name: Trapped Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: Did they... stop?
attributes.name: Trapped Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: Heh... Trying to ambush us? Let's kick this into Overloading Mode, then!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Now. Run.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Running away? Not so fast... Let's try... this—!
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Impossible... Not even my Arts are working...?
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Heheh, that's not all that Sora can do! Sora, rouse me up!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Okay... on it!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Miss Sora... Is it really you? But... Why are you here...?
attributes.name: Trapped Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: Now! Get 'em—
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Just who are you people...?
attributes.name: Panicked Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: Get clear first!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: There ain't time to think 'bout all that... Giddy up! Get movin'!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: (Huh? That girl over there...)
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: (Ugh... I can't. I can't let anybody see me like this...!)
attributes.name: Trapped Lungmen Citizen

attributes.content: Texas, the L.G.D.'s gonna be here mighty soon!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Alright. Exusiai, Sora—
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Yes, I got it...!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Time to split! Buh-bye!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: That girl...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I think I've seen her before... No, I've definitely met her before.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Is that her...?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: She was at the front of the line to hand me a letter at my first fan meeting in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Then, after one last letter, she stopped coming to my events...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'm sure of it. She's my very first fan, after all.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But... what is she doing here in the slums?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: And... those Originium crystals on her arm...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Did she... become an Infected?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: A few days later
Penguin Logistics Office
Ahh... I'm pooped.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Huh, Sora? I didn't know you were here.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Oh, Exusiai, Croissant. Yeah, I'm done with practice for the day.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That's good. We're about to head out. You wanna come with us?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: We gave the L.G.D. a hand the other day, and apparently they gave Boss a call, asking us to stop by their office to get a 'Lungmen Benevolent Organization' certificate.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: After we've done a photoshoot in front of L.G.D. HQ, let's see if anybody dares pull me over~
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: If'n yer drivin', yeah, you'll get pulled over. With them pitchers, though, I reckon ain't nobody gonna come checkin' my business licenses no more...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: If you ask me, I think your little side business deserves to be inspected.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Heh, just makin' a quick buck.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: So what'cha doin', Sora? Hmm... This a letter?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Yeah, it's... a letter from a fan.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Boy, that brings me back. When ya first got here, there was always all kindsa presents pilin' up in front of Penguin Logistics. Mailboxes stuffed to burstin' with fan mail.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Haha... Why don't you two go on ahead? I'll wait for Texas.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Sounds good. Here's the key. I'm hitching a ride with Croissant~
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Don't worry yer li'l wings, Exusiai. I'll get'cha there safe n' sound n' right on time!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Don't be late, Sora! We don't get to be stand-up, model citizens every day!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Yeah, I won't.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: (This should be the one...)
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: (The handwriting... I remember it very well.)
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: (She was there at my fan meeting... My very first fan...)
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh... Have you been waiting for me?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Sora?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Hm? Oh, sorry, Texas. I spaced out.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: It's alright.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Did something happen...?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Oh, don't worry... It's not a big deal...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Texas... Were the people we helped in the slums the other day... all Infected?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That's what's on your mind?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Was there somebody you knew?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'm not sure... but I think there was a girl... who I might've met once... probably.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: If that was really her, then she'd only be there because she was Infected. She wasn't... someone who lived there.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Did you see the letters?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Letters? What letters?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: They came with the notice from L.G.D. this morning. Apparently they're letters of appreciation from the residents we saved.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Those letters are the reason the government is giving us that certificate.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Isn't that what you're reading right now?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Oh, no... This is... a fan letter from before.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: A fan letter? You're reading it now, of all times...?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Uh... Don't worry about it...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: It really is nothing, Texas. I suddenly felt like it. That's all...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Are you coming with me to the L.G.D.? I'll drive.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Mmhm. I'll go!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Get in the car then.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Texas... If... Just if. If a Lungmenite becomes infected, what options do they have?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I can only think of two.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: They either have to leave Lungmen or go to the slums.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Right... There's no other way... I know that.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Texas.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: In the future... will I be allowed to go on deliveries alone? I don't want to be a bother... but I am a member of Penguin Logistics, and I want to help out like everybody else.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Can you protect yourself?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I... I can...!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Once you prove to me you can hold your own, I won't stop you.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Yeah, thanks.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: It kind of feels like I'm always thanking you...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: A week later...
Lungmen, somewhere in the slums
Hello, is anybody home? Your package is here!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Who is it...?
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Hello, the items you ordered on the Penguin Logistics website are here. Could you please sign for the package~?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: A package...? Leave it outside the door.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Umm... could you please sign for the package as well?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I... I'm not sure I can step outside...
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Huh? Is everything okay? Do you need any help?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: No, that's not what I meant... I don't want to come outside... You... You're not infected, right? I have Oripathy... I could spread it to you...
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: I appreciate Penguin Logistics at least letting me place orders, but you could catch Oripathy from me. Please just go!
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Mister... Mister? Please, calm down.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: We've got long, stable relationships with Infected clients. Oripathy isn't something you can catch from physical contact.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Don't worry. All Penguin Logistics staff have received Oripathy prevention training. You can't hurt me.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: And if you need any assistance, we can help you out anytime. We've partnered with a pharmaceutical company on several projects...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Mister, are you okay?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Are you... not afraid of me?
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Of course not! Penguin Logistics aims to serve all customers with wholehearted devotion!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Never mind... Leave it at the door.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Right, can I count on you people to deliver a letter uptown for me next time?
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Of course! Penguin Logistics offers mail delivery too!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Eh... fine. I need to let somebody there know how I'm doing. If they're willing to write back.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Um, Mister...? If you would like, I can help you get in touch...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: No, never mind. Just stay away from me. My brain is a mess right now.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Let's leave it at that. I'll use you guys again next time.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: It wasn't her...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I couldn't find her today either... Maybe she's already left Lungmen.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Maybe it never was her anyway...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But the handwriting in the appreciation letter to Penguin Logistics is the same as the fan letter I got.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: She didn't leave an address or a name. It was just a simple thank you letter, but I know it. It was you.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: ...I just... want to see you once again...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Are you willing to see me? Should... I even see you?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: There is something I want to tell you face to face. I want to tell you that you've got to cheer up and find hope again.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Tomorrow... I'll come again tomorrow.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Two weeks later...
Lungmen slums, during a delivery
Hello, is anybody home? Your package is here!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hello, the items you ordered on the Penguin Logistics website are here. Could you please sign for the package~?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Is anybody home?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: (Grits teeth)
Hm... this is the right delivery time...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hello? Is there really nobody home?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: (Trembles)
...It's her voice.
But...
(It's the right place... Are they not home?)
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'll leave it at the door and send them a delivery confirmation... Okay.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Sora subconsciously places her hand on the edge of her pocket. Slowly, she takes out the letter.
On the old, tattered envelope are the words 'To Miss Sora.'
Sora has read the letter inside and compared it with the letter of appreciation countless times. Its contents have been etched into her soul—
Not only do the words of appreciation within evoke her nostalgia, they help keep her mind at ease.
How come I can't find you? I saw you around here not too long ago... Have you really gone somewhere else?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I... want to see you again.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: The person inside grips the door handle.
Yet the door does not open.
But it's no big deal... I know we'll meet again.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Okay, time for the next package... Where does this one go...?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: She's gone... right?
(Bends over)
attributes.name: Slum Infected

attributes.content: (Picks up the package)
attributes.name: Slum Infected

attributes.content: Thank you... Miss Sora.
attributes.name: Slum Infected

attributes.content: Looks like you got my letter.
attributes.name: Slum Infected

attributes.content: I want to see you again too, but right now... my body... my disease...
attributes.name: Slum Infected

attributes.content: You'll be happy once I finally find the courage to face myself again, right?
attributes.name: Slum Infected

attributes.content: I... I'll come to your concerts again, and I will be there at your fan meetings.
attributes.name: Slum Infected

attributes.content: Someday.
attributes.name: Slum Infected
